#summary Refactoring to remove all regions in a file.
[http://www.rorybecker.me.uk/DevExpress/Plugins/Community/CR_RemoveRegions http://dxcorecommunityplugins.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Common/Graphics/Download.png]      [http://code.google.com/p/dxcorecommunityplugins/wiki/InstallInstructions  http://dxcorecommunityplugins.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Common/Graphics/InstallHelp.png]

= Introduction =
Provides a refactoring that removes all region directives in a file.

= Usage =
Place the caret on a region directive and invoke the "Remove Regions" refactoring.
